alert.note: Alert for Boone; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:28PM CDT until May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NEWTON AND SOUTHEASTERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 128 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Olvey to near Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Bergman... Lost Valley State Park... Erbie... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Bellefonte... Boxley... Mossville... Marble Falls... Compton... Low Gap... Gaither... Ponca... Mt Sherman... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
